com.opentok.cloud.controller.stream

Interface Stream


  • public interface Stream
    Represents a stream published in the OpenTok session.

    When Streams are added to a session, the StreamListener.onStreamCreated() method is called. When Streams are removed from a session, the StreamListener.onStreamDestroyed() method is called.

    When a property of a stream changes, the StreamListener.onStreamModified() method is called.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Stream.Reason
      Specifies values for the reason parameter of the StreamListener.onStreamDestroyed() method.

      The name of the stream.

      The OpenTok session to which the stream belongs.
      int getVideoHeight()
      The heigh of the video, in pixels.
      int getVideoWidth()
      The width of the video, in pixels.
      boolean hasAudio()
      Whether the stream has audio.
      boolean hasVideo()
      Whether the stream has video.

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        The name of the stream. Publishers can specify a name when publishing a stream. The name appears at the bottom of of publisher and subscriber videos.
